attributes.action: Introduce a law to prevent prohibit the transfer of power to the EU without a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a law to prevent/prohibit the transfer of power to the EU without a referendum, making it impossible for a party to promise a referendum in their manifesto, then betray that promise when in power.

rejection.details:
There are currently a number of similar petitions on the site: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Lisbon-ref/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ECTTOL/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LeaveEU1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
